item.title: VIM Cheat Sheet
item.author: mail@richardmillen.com (Richard Millen)
item.description: Application Starting Command Info find -xtype f -regex ".*\.md" -exec vim {} + open all markdown (.md) files under the current working directory find -xtype f -regex ".*\.\(cpp\|hpp\)" -exec vim {} + open all c++ source files under the current working directory Exiting Command Info :wq or :x or ZZ write (save) and quit :q quit (fails if there are unsaved changes) :q!
